sentences.en: A great deal of tin used to be mined in the southwestern part of England.
sentences.cn: 在英国西南部曾一度开掘出大量的锡.

sentences.en: Are we going in the southwestern direction?
sentences.cn: 我们是朝着西南方向走 吧 ?

sentences.en: Army Engineers were in the southwestern deserts building transportation bridges over dry riverbeds.
sentences.cn: 他们在荒凉的沙漠峡谷中工作着,由几个幸存下来的群落所包绕.

sentences.en: Both technologies are currently used by UT Southwestern gastroenterologists.
sentences.cn: 此两种技术目前被UT西南胃肠病专家所运用.

sentences.en: Breaded, fried, whole - button mushrooms. Served with Ranch or Southwestern Ranch dressing.
sentences.cn: 整只蘑菇裹上面包, 入油烹炸. 随品搭配西南牧场风味配料.
这是西南航空公司 吗 ?

sentences.en: Jordan's port; located in southwestern Jordan on the Gulf of Aqaba.
sentences.cn: 约旦的港口城市; 位于约旦西南部,临亚喀巴湾.

sentences.en: Melting features along the Ryukyu slab tear , beneath the southwestern Okinawa Trough.
sentences.cn: 在OkinawaTrough西南之下沿着琉球群岛板层断裂的熔化特征.

sentences.en: Near the southwestern corner, the climate is mild and springlike in winter.
sentences.cn: 在西南角的附近, 冬天的气候温暖如春.

sentences.en: One of the lines connects Shanghai to the southwestern city of Kunming.
sentences.cn: 其中一条是接驳上海到西南城市昆明的线.

sentences.en: Painstaking craftsmanship using natural materials is key to Southwestern style.
sentences.cn: 对天然材料的精心制作工艺是西南部厨房风格的关键所在.

sentences.en: Served with marinara sauce, Southwestern Ranch dressing and sour cream.
sentences.cn: 另配意大利番茄酱, 墨西哥餐点牧场调料和酸奶油.

sentences.en: The news is from the southwestern country.
sentences.cn: 这个消息来自西南方向的村子.

sentences.en: The Xifanping porphyry copper deposit is located in the southwestern Sichuan Province.
sentences.cn: 四川盐源西范坪斑岩铜矿床中存在大量钾长环斑结构.

sentences.en: There were very few border controls on the southwestern frontier.
sentences.cn: 西南国界上没几个边境检查站.

trans.tran_en: in or from the southwest part of a country or area

trans.tran_cn: 西南人，住在西南部的人
